name: Conservatory-Trained
source: Heroes of the High Court pg. 16
text: Your training at Jalmeray’s famed Conservatory on the island of Grand Sarret helps you perceive others’ interests and leverage them for your benefit.
benefit: You gain an insight bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier on discovery checks using the individual influence system (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Intrigue 102). In addition, when you discover an NPC’s strength, the next influence check an ally attempts that incorporates that strength receives a +2 bonus.
text_zh: 你在位于扎摩诔-大萨雷特岛上的著名音乐学院受训，这有助于你觉察到他人的关注点并借此为自己谋利。
benefit_zh: 你在使用个体影响力系统（individual influence system）进行通晓（discovery）检定时，获得一个等同于你感知调整值的洞察加值。此外，当你使用通晓（discovery）获取一个NPC的强项（strength）时，下一个对盟友的影响力（influence）检定将结合该强项，获得一个+2加值。
